name: Early Access - This Is Not a Trap
name_original: Early Access - This Is Not a Trap
description:
"This game is certainly not a trap designed to keep you in virtual reality." - The Administrator

I developed "Early Access - This is not a trap" while learning Unity 3d, C#, and the XR Toolkit. Puzzle game or tech demo with narrative, play for yourself to decide!

The game is about being inside someone's in development Unity Game. I don't have much experience, so I thought that I'd make it the theme. It's heavily inspired by games like Portal and The Stanley Parable.

Sidequest Link: https://sidequestvr.com/app/2406/early-access-this-is-not-a-trap

Don't have a VR headset but are interested? Full playthrough uploaded here: https://youtu.be/xknspDy9DaQ

Note much of the voice acting audio is unmastered.

Thanks to all the Asset Creators out there. They are listed fully in the games credits. If I haven't credited you fairly please message me and I will do so. This game was developed as a learning experience and not for profit.
